text: Thundershorts is a short-form comedy website founded in June 2014. It features comedians such as Michael Showalter, Jim Gaffigan, Michael Che, Janeane Garofalo, Kumail Nanjiani, David Wain and Ted Alexandro.https://www.nytimes.com/2014/09/11/arts/funny-kooky-and-short-on- the-net.html?_r=0https://www.usatoday.com/story/popcandy/2014/06/27/week- pop/11457911/http://observer.com/2014/07/poking-a-dead-frog-mike-sacks-on- advice-writing-and-tv-comedys-new-diy- attitude/https://www.usatoday.com/story/popcandy/2014/06/27/week-pop/11457911/ ==References== ==External links== * Category:American comedy websites Category:Internet properties established in 2014
title: Thundershorts
